name: ListKnowledgeBases
description: List all available Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Bases and their data sources. Returns a mapping of knowledge base IDs to their details including name, description, and associated data sources.

name: QueryKnowledgeBases
description: Query an Amazon Bedrock Knowledge Base using natural language. Retrieves relevant documents and content based on the query with configurable result count and reranking options.

query.description: A natural language query to search the knowledge base with

knowledge_base_id.description: The knowledge base ID to query. Must be a valid ID from the ListKnowledgeBases tool

number_of_results.description: The number of results to return. Use smaller values for focused results and larger values for broader coverage.

reranking.description: Whether to rerank the results. Useful for improving relevance and sorting.

reranking_model_name.description: The name of the reranking model to use. Options: 'COHERE', 'AMAZON'

data_source_ids.description: The data source IDs to filter the knowledge base by. Must be valid data source IDs from the ListKnowledgeBases tool
